page.title: 09East Sherford Farm
page.content: {East Sherford Farm }is situated approximately 2.5km south of Glen Park Primary School. The farm existed before the time of Sir Francis Drake, and was given by Queen Elizabeth 1st and has been in the family, until quiet recently. The farm is run by four men, and is a dairy farm with 140 Friesan cows, 2 bulls and 50 calves. Each cow produces 1350 gallons of milk a year. The farm provides milk to the Co-op Dairy in Plymouth. There is also a herd of Charolais Cattle for beef. The cattle feed on silage and hay in the winter, and on grass in spring and summer. They grow rye corn and corn barley. Dean Park, Paul Wood, Nicholas Thornton & Michael O'Gorman.
